item.description:
Just a note in case anyone didn't get Dianne's email. She's unable to host the event. Feel free to still casually meetup and shoot with each other. Enjoy the night!

 

 

Summer evening, lights on the harbor, night life in the city!  Evening shoot on the waterfront.  Need I say more???

 

OK... I will...

We're returning to the waterfront where there is no shortage of subjects in this one area from the reflections of the night lights on the water and buildings to the colorful Northern Avenue bridge and the city lights off in the distance and even the character of the Barking Crab restaurant.

 

GETTING THERE

You can take the T to the Silverline stop at Courthouse Station.

You can drive in to the parking lot across from the Moakley Courthouse.  Published rates on the Courthouse website shows $10.00 - $13.00.
item.how_to_find_us: Meet at the entrance to the Northern Ave Bridge near the courthouse
item.name: Night Shoot:: Boston Waterfront
